original_text: He has confirmed his words, which he spoke against us and against our rulers who ruled us, by bringing upon us a great calamity. For under the whole heaven there has not been done anything like what has been done against Jerusalem.
korean_text: 주께서 큰 재앙을 우리에게 내리사 우리와 및 우리를 재판하던 재판관을 쳐서 하신 말씀을 이루셨사오니 온 천하에 예루살렘에서 일어난 일 같은 것이 없나이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 우리를 대항하여 말씀하신 것들이며,

sentences.original_text: by bringing upon us a great calamity.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리에게 큰 재앙을 가져오심으로써 그렇게 하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: there has not been done anything
like what has been done against Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘에게 행해진 것과 같은 일은 말입니다.
